name: VR Drivers
description: Race your fast-paced racing car on specially prepared tracks in VR Drivers game. Sit in your chair, put on the goggles of virtual reality, grip the steering wheel and feel like a real driver. Race with computer opponents and improve your race record.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: Intel i5-6400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 / RX 480 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: Intel i7-7700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
